alert.note: Alert for Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 7:38PM CST until January 31 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River at Riverside affecting Polk, Trinity, Walker and San Jacinto Counties. For the Trinity River...including Crockett, Riverside, Romayor, Goodrich, Liberty, Moss Bluff...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Riverside. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 135.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding continues as significant backwater up Thomas Lake floods the lowest areas in the Green Rich Shore Subdivision in Walker County with the boat ramp completely inundated. The lowest lying areas in the Deep River Plantation Subdivision and FM 980 northwest of Riverside are threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Sunday the stage was 134.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 132.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:30 PM CST Sunday was 135.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday morning and continue falling to 132.4 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 133.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 135.0 feet on 06/19/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Trinity River Riverside 133.5 134.9 Sun 6 pm CST 134.4 133.7 133.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.Monday afternoon at 145 PM CST.
